apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji, rendered with Appleâ€™s signature glossy 3D shading, depicts two men embracing, their hands forming a heart above them, set against a backdrop of soft gradients. On Apple devices, the figures exhibit smooth, rounded edges and realistic lighting, conveying a sense of deep connection and love. Their medium-light and medium-dark skin tones are depicted with subtle detail, symbolizing diverse relationships and the universal expression of affection in digital conversations.
